campaign.story:
ShadowCast is the simplest way to play console games on your computer. TVs aren’t always convenient so we made a way to take console gaming with you wherever you are without the need of an internet connection.       



As lifelong console gamers, we know there may be some PC master race gamers who gawk at the idea of playing Mario on their powerful gaming computer.  But we say the more games we can play, on even more platforms, the better! 
Seamless console docking to your laptop. It's that simple!
Laptops are Really Versatile Screens
The biggest benefit of course is to take advantage of the screen you’re always carrying already.  Not one of those additional portable monitors but a laptop that we use daily for like… school, work, shopping and creative stuff. 
ShadowCast completely hides in the shadows of the original Switch dock!
Let's imagine a time before 2020... and you were waiting at an airport for a flight to board and you wanted to get a couple rounds of Smash Bros in with a friend… or two… or three. Tabletop mode is nice… but let’s just say it’s not the most ergonomic. With ShadowCast you can easily plug your Nintendo Switch to your laptop and play on a screen over 4x the size.
Not quite as easy as adjusting the viewing angle of a laptop, is it?
You Could Always use Another TV
There's also many situations where there just isn’t a HDMI display available - many of us are happy with our laptops and integrated desktop computers. I think back to the times when I lived in a dorm room or even living abroad for brief periods where having my laptop, a PS5, and a ShadowCast would’ve been amazing. 
Works with current-gen and next-gen with up to 4K input
And then there’s always competing for the living room television - whether it’s someone in your household streaming a whole season of the latest Netflix series or just having another gamer in the household. Oh and it also makes having a second television for multiplayer that much more convenient to set up. 
PS5 on an iMac - when a TV just simply isn't available
Our App Makes the Difference
Accompanying the ShadowCast is our new Genki Arcade app. We literally have made it easier than reaching for the TV remote and hitting the "input" button. We've designed Genki Arcade from the ground up to minimize computing resources and prioritize latency for gaming performance. Just open the app, and it'll auto detect ShadowCast and you'll be playing immediately without any settings to fiddle with.
TV vs. ShadowCast - HDMI splitter shows a 0-0.02s difference in Smash Bros.
Genki Arcade (left) is 50ms faster than OBS (right) and uses less than 1/3 of the CPU
We've developed a native Mac OS app that's optimized for both Apple Silicon and Intel processors as well as a dedicated app for Windows. Additionally, we're in the process of making a web browser version that allows you to play on shared/public computers and other systems without installing any software (compatibility will vary, for example iPadOS currently doesn’t detect external video devices but we’re confident it will someday!).
Windows or Mac, we got your Animal Crossing addiction covered
 The beauty of being able to connect your gaming console to your computer means you can actually record, edit, and stream your gameplay. While it may not be at the same level as a professional grade capture card that costs 5-10x more, it’s more than capable for most gameplay capturing needs while being much more flexible and easy to use across multiple platforms. 
We're making last year's best capture cards feel a bit outdated.
Record To Your Heart’s Content
Sure you can use the built-in video recording feature on the Nintendo Switch but that’s limited to 30 seconds - that mean you'll have to rush that epic boss fight or finish that speed-run extra fast.  It's is also a pain to export and you’re limited by an already small internal storage and expensive memory cards. With ShadowCast you don't have to worry about recording length and can rewatch your whole session of Among Us, add your commentary, and refine your strategy.
With a 30 second limit everyone is sus!
We’ve actually created what we believe is the most simple to use, not just for playing but also to record gameplay videos.  Here’s a sample of a recording of us playing on various consoles with the ShadowCast: 
These videos are screen recordings of gameplay played off an early build of our dedicated Genki Arcade app.
Plays Nice with Others 
We made the Genki Arcade app to be truly simple to use, but for those that need more complexity you’ll be happy to know that ShadowCast is compatible with popular professional capture card applications such as Open Broadcaster Software (OBS), Streamlabs OBS, XSplit, and much more. This will allow you to capture video with detailed customizations and even overlay various webcam feeds, graphics, and animations.
It's pretty much compatible with everything you throw at it

Begin Your Career as an Influencer
Ultimately the main reason for anyone to capture video is so that they can share it with the world. ShadowCast can easily upload your previously recorded or edited videos and even stream live to your favorite platform - whether your team Twitch, YouTube, or FaceBook, we got you covered.  
To maximize compatibility across as many platforms as possible, we’ve disguised ShadowCast as a webcam so that it can do a few more party tricks. This means it can actually be selected as a webcam under many typical apps popular today thanks to all the remote working, including Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, and FaceTime - and further even supports video players like QuickTime and VLC if you don’t have our app installed.
Video Chat Your Gameplay
This allows you to not only share your gameplay live with anyone, but you can actually play with your friends and see them on split screen just as if you were playing in couch co-op mode in-person.
You can play any of your favorite games in split-screen even without being on a couch
Don’t Settle for a Weak Webcam
As an additional benefit, ShadowCast works with all HDMI output devices beyond gaming consoles, including better cameras.  This means you can upgrade your video conference by swapping out your poor built-in webcam for most digital cameras, including DSLRs, camcorders, and action cameras - as long as it supports HDMI out (some cameras require a HDMI-mini/micro converter).  No more grainy, low resolution videos with poor lighting. 
Kickstarter compresses these images, but hopefully you get the idea!
The Perfect Stay-at-Home Camera Assistant
It’s also quite useful for situations where you just need to see what you're photographing or recording on a bigger laptop screen - no need for expensive wireless monitors! 
A better view of your DSLR in real-time so you can skip the expensive screen monitor
We actually had the idea of ShadowCast back in 2019 and started to collaborate with  manufacturers of the top video streaming and capture card brands. The timing was a bit too early as the components needed were overly expensive and had originally intended to make a Super Dock. Since then, we've refined the idea, dived into software and made something that we're quite excited to share here.
Might as well make it as small as possible right?
Here's also a video showcasing the latency between a TV and ShadowCast. We setup a powered HDMI splitter to show the screens simultaneously with the same baseline:
PLAY

Setup ShadowCast in 3 simple steps!
If you need a more visual adventure we've prepared a short video showing the 3 simple steps in real-time to setup ShadowCast.
PLAY

This is really, really small
Dimensions are 25 x 52 x 9mm or 0.98" x 2.1" x 0.35"
Weighs just 10 grams (latest prototype)
HDMI 2.0 input brings in 4K video from the latest game consoles, including the Nintendo Switch, Playstation 4/5, and XBox Series S/X
USB-C output transfers to computer up to 1920x1080 @ 60fps
Genki Arcade app requires macOS 10.12+ or Windows 7+
Includes USB-C 2.0 Cable 1.8m long cable


 Get more ShadowCasts if you wanted various colors or one for every console:
Get a Covert Dock, a pocketable dock and GaN charger for the Switch and more:
Get a Genki Audio, connects 2 Bluetooth headphones to your Switch (and other consoles) works docked, and has a port to charge your Switch:
Get a Genki Audio Lite, a slimmer portable Bluetooth audio adapter that is optimized for the Switch and Switch Lite (does not fit PS5): 
Get a Force Field Lite, a dual magnetic enclosure grip case with vegan leather to protect your Switch Lite with compatibility for both Genki Audio and Audio Lite: 
If you're in need of a flexible HDMI, premium USB-C 3.1 cable, or portable metal stand: 
Genki was a brand founded by three guys with a dream to challenge the gaming accessory industry to make more compelling hardware.  Eddie, Chris, and Andrew miss the good old days of gaming accessories that truly improved the console experience such as the Game Genie, GameBoy Light Magnifier, and Guncon.  But we didn't do this alone, and there's a lot of people to thank for bringing this project to life:
 Alex Miller for developing our fantastically optimized Genki Arcade app 
 Ben Lau for teleporting all the products to our backers
 King Sun for helping us put together this hectic fast-paced crazy video
 Roanna Wong for holding down the fort of customer inquiries 
 Yin Xiao for the fantastic product design support, you're amazing
And of course, we want to thank backers like you. With your crowdfunding support we’ve been able to operate as a quirky indie hardware developer free from outside investors. This means we can keep our focus on designing innovative human things we believe in without compromises.
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.
braag - A boutique pre-launch to post-launch marketing agency leveraging data-driven customer acquisition to fuel record breaking Kickstarters.
This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $325MM through crowdfunding.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We launched the most funded gaming hardware project on Kickstarter of 2018 and 2019 so we've been through this rodeo. By now the risks are less of us being able to make the product but more likely if we deliver on time. One of the biggest chunks of time is always the pre-production phase which includes tooling/mold production, test molds, and securing components. This time, we’ve actually gotten a lot of the work done before launching the project which means greater financial risk for us but a lot less timeline uncertainty for our backers. We're happy to say we're even better equipped to face these challenges but no matter how much we plan there’s always a chance that things can go wrong. Whether its production, logistics, or completely random events, we promise to always share with you full transparency on our hiccups and resolve them in a way that keeps our backers happy and proud to keep supporting Genki.

Note: there are some shipping risks now to certain countries dealing with uncertainty such as the UK (Brexit) and new India import tariffs. Regional lockdowns also impact postal services but we'll do our best to get ShadowCast to you wherever you are.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Our product physically uses the least material resources through a minimized design - nearly 10x smaller and less build material than similar consumer hardware. It's designed to last across console generations for as long as HDMI is the standard.

updates.update_userinfo: The Genki Arcade App and Sticker
updates.update_content:
And off we go! 🪐
February just flew by for us - but we're very excited to see a bunch of new games announced, even if the Nintendo Direct wasn't mind blowing, we're still glad to see it's back nonetheless.  I myself am pouring some of the little spare time I have into Persona 5 Strikers. Okay, back to business! We'll drill into 3 areas in this update:
Genki Arcade App
Pledge Manager and Shipping 
Sticker #3
Genki Arcade is the name of the ShadowCast App

updates.update_userinfo: 1st Batch Shipment, Pledge Managers, and Add-ons
updates.update_content:
The First Shipment
So the good news is we are done with production of the Early Access batch and will be distributing to global warehouses so that we can get packages to you in a quick and reliable manner. While we have 30,000 backers, what's even crazier is that we'll be shipping to 96 countries. This is definitely a record for us, and luckily we're tackling this in monthly batches this time. Here's a breakdown of our Early Access backers - these sold out incredibly fast and is over 70% from the United States but still it's a monumental task for us to ship to 43 countries this month!

Wow, just wow. Our biggest project, ever.
We can't believe how crazy this project has been from beginning to end and what a finish.  You guys are awesome, 30,382 of you (and 7,243 of you are first time Kickstarter backers, welcome!) have supported this project and we can't be more thrilled to be able to bring this project to life.

Merry Chrismahanukwanzakah!
This year has been a crazy rollercoaster ride and I for one can't wait to move onto a fresh New Year.  First thing is this is our biggest first day on Kickstarter, ever!  We hit our funding goal in a mere 22 minutes(!) and to be honest we never expected to creep past our Covert Dock launch - especially given that we launched on a holiday week!  So just to say it again and again, thank you!

campaign.story:
Anytongs instantly turns your flatware into versatile kitchen tongs. Why have multiple clunky tongs when you can simply use the forks and spoons you already have? Go ahead and turn those hearty meats, stir some noodles, and serve that delicious salad. You’ll always have tongs ready when you need them with Anytongs.
Anytongs uses tension strength to easily and quickly attach a wide range of flatware. It's specially designed to ensure your flatware stays in place securely while in use. The rubberized slots are tapered to fit flat styled handles various widths, shapes and even curves! Go ahead and grab, flip, stab, and tug with total confidence and control. 
Kitchen drawers and utensil holders are filled with clutter. We all know how important it is to have multiple tongs available but they just take up too much space. With Anytongs, you'll have best of both worlds! Multiple tongs using your existing flatware without having all the extra clunkiness taking up precious storage in your kitchen. 
Health and food experts agree that using the same kitchen utensils to prepare meats and vegetables increases the risk of cross-contamination. Switching out for freshly clean tongs is effective food handling hygiene that helps stop the spread of foodborne illnesses. Have confidence and peace of mind when using Anytongs to prepare and serve food for your family, friends, and guests!
We've put in a lot of thought into the construction and design of Anytongs. Dozens of prototypes and over a hundred different pieces of flatware were tested. What we've come up with is a truly simple and elegant design that's a joy to use. This small, lightweight tool doesn't make wimpy tongs either. The unique attachment method securely keeps your flatware in place and the fine-tuned torque hinge operates smoothly for maximum control, precision, and comfort. You're going to love how Anytongs feel in your hands!

 Anytongs flatware demo
We've done countless testing on a wide range of flat shaped flatware and here's just a small sample of the many different styles and shapes Anytongs works great with. 
PLAY

Can Anytongs Handle The Pressure?
Anytongs has quite a grip! Feel confident your flatware will stay in place withstanding nearly 12lbs of pressure!
PLAY


Prototyping Process
 Our First Test Run! 
To make sure we minimize as much risk as possible, we did ALL the legwork to close the loop on the entire manufacturing process. We even went as far as running a small batch production test run! After carefully inspecting every piece with our manufacturing partner, we are excited to report it was perfect! This has given us incredible confidence that with your support, Anytongs can be produced at scale reliably without major suprises in the process. This ensures our backers get their Anytongs on time and on target! 
PLAY

PLAY

Our sincerest thank you to all of our backers! We're excited to get these into your homes and grateful for your support. Anytongs will be shipped using eco-friendly kraft cardboard packaging with some cool stickers inside.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our first Kickstarter project and in our best effort to reduce as much risk as possible, we waited until we had everything in place and working before launching. We've gone through countless prototypes and multiple rounds of manufacturing tests to make sure to "close the loop" of the entire process. We are excited to say we are ready to reliably produce Anytongs with our manufacturing partner. Everything is ready to move into full production with your support! However we are realistic and know that no project is ever 100% free of risk.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Anytongs is made of high quality and super durable materials that will stand the test of time and wear. Not only will Anytongs last, it will be out of your way with such a small footprint when not in use.
Reusability and recyclability
Anytongs is meant to be kept, not thrown out. The polypropylene material used is extremely durable and recyclable. Additionally, the package it comes shipped in is made of eco-friendly, sustainably sourced kraft cardboard.
Environmentally friendly factories
We will only work with manufacturers that operate responsibly and consciously towards the positive impact of the environment and society. Our vetting process include but not limited to: Working conditions, fair pay, environmental responsibility, and a track record of good business ethics.
Sustainable Distribution
We will use sustainably sourced and 100% recyclable packaging. Anytongs will be shipped using kraft cardboard mailer using minimal ink for branding.
Something else
Our pledge is to constantly improve the sustainability and environmental impact of our products.

updates.update_content:
Hey Backers,
We are excited to share that US orders have been shipped out and should be delivered before Christmas! We even hit our stretch goal to ship out Anytongs for our northern neighbors in Canada! 👊 
I want to take a moment to give a huge shoutout to the United States Postal Service, particulary the office in Montclair, NJ. It’s an insanely busy time and they still accepted over 500 packages. A bunch of champs. I hope everyone can appreciate their dedication and hard work especially in 2020. 🙌

updates.update_userinfo: 📫 US Orders Are Out For Delivery!
updates.update_content:
Still On Track!
Hello Backers,
We've been busy getting all the packaging set and logistics in order and happy to give an update! Although there were some delays, we will begin shipping to our US Backers in the next 2 days! That means you can still expect to receive your Anytongs before Christmas 🙌. We do apologize that it's cutting it real close and we appreciate everyone's support and patience.

Hello Backers,
This is a friendly reminder to all backers who have not yet filled out the reward survey with your shipping information, to please do so by this week so we can move forward.    

We understand that some have had issues with submitting the survey and have let us know, and have already provided us with your shipping information.  We appreciate that, and nothing else has to be done.

Hello Potential Backers, 
We wanted to shoot out a reminder that it's the last day of our campaign. If you back this project now, you'll have your Anytongs in time for the holidays (US only). Many of our backers are just as excited to gift these as they are to have their own and we want to make sure you catch the opportunity in time. 
We're so glad that you were interested enough to follow our project! We hope to be sending you Anytongs after the campaign!

Hi Backers!
Some of you have been asking for a demo of different flatware being used with Anytongs and we are super happy to provide you with a video for that. We also did a pressure test to show how securely flatware stays attached 💪
Big thanks for all the feedback and support! These videos have also been added to our campaign page.

campaign.story:
Remote Play. Outsmarted is the first board game DESIGNED to support remote play. Perfect in these times when friends and family cannot always be together.  Even better is that only YOU need to own the game - your friends and family can use the FREE Outsmarted app to join your game!
 Fantastic Team / Party Mode. Supporting up to 6 teams of 4 players (24 players). But beware - even in team mode, Outsmarted sometimes selects one member of the team for an important solo question.  
 Localised Questions. The questions in Outsmarted are dependent on the region that you select within the software. At launch the US, British, Canadian and International English versions will be available with further foreign language versions in 2021. 
 Play it your way. Outsmarted is as much fun with just 2 players as it is with a huge team of 24!   Play it with your Windows laptop, an iPad, Android tablet or mobile phone. You can share just one device or connect a second or third as well as up to 6 mobiles as handheld controllers (one for each player or team).    
 Almost no learning curve. Outsmarted has almost no learning curve.  The AI hosts the show.  It always knows who's turn it is and which IQ Rings each player / team has collected. Anyone in the family can play straight away.
 Questions by professional question writers. To make sure we have the best content on the planet, we have a small team of highly experienced question writers that have been involved in major TV show question writing.
 A life time of free updates. Outsmarted is the world's first board game that constantly evolves with new surprises and great free new content on a regular basis. It means it never gets boring like other board games tend to over time!
 In game leaderboard. The in game leaderboard at the end of each round shows the positions of all players / teams. It also shows correct answer percentages for each player / team.
 The 3D Genius Miniatures. We have put a lot of effort into the design of the 3D painted miniature genius characters that feature in Outsmarted and they're adorable as a result!! You can see the full line up below with more to come in future versions.  Got an idea for a new 'Genius'?  Drop us a line with your nominee!  
 The Question Store. Outsmarted includes enough questions for hundreds of hours of play. If you need more questions or just want to customise the game with questions about topics you love - no worries!  The Question Store gives you instant access to an amazing library of additional content for free or low cost. 
(** Remote play functionality using the physical board allows people in different locations to play together, either using two physical game boards or for guest players that don't own the game using a 'join game' code. In addition we are developing further remote-play functionality that includes a virtual dice, virtual board and virtual in-game player figures - this will be released as a free update when available in February 2021.)    
Get Outsmarted to your door in time for Christmas 2020!! We are happy to offer a refund to any backer that doesn't receive their copy in time and wishes to cancel their order. 
There are two great value versions of Outsmarted available on Kickstarter, offered at a big discount on the future retail price: 
The Standard Retail Version 
The Kickstarter Limited Edition Version
 Please select the version you prefer before you place your order.  
Over 17 million people have helped launch innovative new products on Kickstarter. This includes hit games like "Exploding Kittens" - which has gone on to sell 10 million units worldwide!  We've chosen Kickstarter because it's the perfect platform to share the joy of ground-breaking game ahead of its full retail release.  
This enables you to get your copy long before it is available to buy in the shops. And even better...  it's delivered directly to your door at a discounted price! 
If you would like to order Outsmarted in time for Christmas, choose "BACK THIS PROJECT" or click directly on the version you would like.  Then fill in your payment details. It's as simple as that. We will then be in touch at the end of the Kickstarter campaign to confirm your delivery address and full order details.     
If you have any suggestions for Outsmarted let us know. We will read and reply to every single comment!  
Seven stretch goals have been unlocked!! 
There's more than one way to play Outsmarted! From intimate two-player games with just an iPad to the real Game Show experience on a big screen TV.  Which one are you?
The Purist - The purist has trouble letting go of that dusty old question pack, but soon realises Outsmarted is just.. a lot better!  So they opt for intimate candle-lit iPad sessions (with the volume set low), playing with their partner or perhaps even a guest or two on very special occasions.
The Family Guy - The family guy (or girl!) understands Outsmarted is the perfect way to get the whole family involved. They have struggled to find a game that everyone enjoys playing and their kids spend more time glued to their phone than reality. But with Outsmarted everyone's happy and can compete together, best of all...  their kids are learning without even knowing it!   
The Frenemy  - The frenemy is your best friend until they get around a table with a board game. They suddenly change to be uber competitive. They are prone to sending invites weeks in advance - "How about Outsmarted three weeks on Saturday?" They make sure their iPhone 11 Pro is fully charged before the game starts because they somehow believe all that processing power and a full battery gives them an edge.    
The Show Off - The show off streams Outsmarted to their 4K projector with their 8 speaker Dolby Digital setup providing an arena-like atmosphere. They place a large leather chair in front of the screen and everyone has to take the hot-seat during their turn with a spotlight shining down on them for extra pressure! 
The Control Freak - The control freak runs Outsmarted on their Windows laptop and streams their laptop screen to the TV. They then act as a TV show host using their mouse to control the game. They can be heard frequently saying "Is that your FINAL answer?" & "That's the WRONG answer!"
The Party Animal - The party animal invites everyone over for a mass team game of Outsmarted. Rounding up 6 teams of 4 players (24 total)! They also have a giant trophy for the winners and an endless supply of drinks and snacks on hand.    
In Outsmarted there are six Ring Categories, each representing a unique challenge that you will have to master.  Land on a Ring Question and answer it correctly - you win that Ring. Collect all 6 Rings to reach the Final Round.      
Raw brain power.. this category involves observation, logic, reasoning, pattern recognition and sometimes a bit of quick arithmetic.  The catch is...  it's all against the clock!        
This category is about all the things you could or probably should have learned at school. Questions cover - History, Geography, Physics, Biology, Chemistry, English Language and Mathematics.        
If it happened yesterday it could be featured in the game today! New content is added to the Breaking News category daily. Questions cover World News, Celebrity News, Regional News, Political News, Tech news, Scientific News and Environmental News.       
This category is about pure Trivia.  The questions are similar to those you might find in old school trivia games or quizzes. Crazy facts, unusual events, things you should've known and things you didn't know you knew!      
No self-respecting Quiz Show would be complete without a category covering TV, Film & Books. What's great about Outsmarted is that many of the questions in this section include photos and video clips!     
And of course we haven't forgotten Music!  In addition to Musical themed trivia and specialist knowledge, we hope to have finalised a licensing deal by the time of launch which permits us to offer "name that tune" sound questions.      
Outsmarted includes 2,500+ multimedia questions. Perfect for hours and hours of play. This is already way more than most 'card' questions provided by our traditional board game competitors, so in theory the average player shouldn't feel the need for additional questions for a long time.  But if you do get the itch for something new... 
The in-game Question Store is there for you!  It's a world first.. being able to expand your board game and add exciting new content for years to come with one swipe. 
So what does this mean for you?     
More Questions if you ever need them
If you play a lot you will eventually require more questions.  With all of our cardboard competitors that's game over... go out and buy a new game sucker.   
But not with Outsmarted!  We can provide you with an entire new game's worth of questions in an instant... and at a fraction of the price of buying a new game!   
An entire Core Question Pack of 2,500+ Questions is available in-game from only £6.99 / $8.99. Incredible value!  Incredible longevity!    
Get exactly what you want
The questions categories in Outsmarted are great, but If you ever want more of the kind of questions you really love, you can get them instantly in the Question Store. 
Add Speciality Question Packs to the existing library of questions so they are added into the mix, or you can switch out a whole category you don't want and replace it with your chosen pack.  What's more, you can do this on a game by game basis in seconds.
Don't like Breaking News... switch it for the 1990's.  
Don't like Back to School... switch it for Sports! 
In fact.. you can customise all the categories to your chosen subjects if you wish!
Eventually, hundreds of Speciality Question Packs will be available, some are completely FREE OF CHARGE and others will start at only £1.99 / $2.49 for lifetime ownership.   
If you have a suggestion for a question pack you would like to see in the future get in touch and tell us!    

Focus. A lot of questions are designed to leave you with no time to think. Complete focus is needed from the first second of the countdown to give you the best possible chance. 
Know when to use an assist. If you go out all guns blazing with your assists, you won’t have any in reserve for the crucial ring questions. Likewise, if a question comes with a significant surprise bonus, it’s often worth using an assist or two to nail that question and grab the bonus.
Stay goal oriented. For example, when playing a fixed time-length game of 60 minutes and there is a tie for first place, the winner could be decided by the number of assists each player has remaining when the time is up.  So conserve your assists  in a fixed-time match - unless you’re going all in on a ring question.
Make quick decisions. Quite often it’s clear that one or two possible answers are definitely wrong.  When under pressure, quick decisions to eliminate these is often the difference between winning and losing. 
Plot your path. Going for your strongest categories can be a good idea in a fixed time game of 30 or 60 minutes. And if possible, memorise the 'roll again' opportunities so you don't miss them.         
Is Outsmarted really that much of a leap on its traditional Quiz and Trivia counterparts? We have put together this table to show you all the main advantages.   
Help us spread the word about Outsmarted. Tell your friends, your neighbours & your family! With your help increasing our userbase we can more quickly develop major game features and content as well as meeting the incredible stretch goals we are about to announce here on Kickstarter.          
All versions of Outsmarted are the same physical boxed product, with the same game board (the board contains no text). When you first startup the Outsmarted software / app you simply select your preferred region to get localised game content and to play in your language. 
Please check this list below to see what date your native language version will become available within the Outsmarted software: 
English  (United States Version) - Available at launch December 2020
English (United Kingdom Version) - Available at launch December 2020
English (Canadian Version) - Available at launch December 2020
English (International Version) - Available at launch December 2020
German Version - Not available until April 2021
French Version - Not available until April 2021 
Dutch Version - Not available until June 2021
Spanish Version - Not available until June 2021
Italian Version - Not available until September 2021
Regional differences in the English Language Versions
All questions included within the International English Version are relevant to all English speakers wherever they are from. In addition by selecting a specific region (USA / UK or Canada) you will get additional region-specific questions added into the mix. For example selecting the US version at install would result in about 30% of all questions served by Outsmarted being specifically about American News, Politics, Celebrities, History, Geography and Sport and so on. 
Other Language Versions
Backers that speak French, German, Spanish, Dutch or Italian can purchase and enjoy Outsmarted right away in English and then switch to their native language within the software when it becomes available in the future.  
Over the course of 2021 we may be adding even further language options, but we are unable to confirm which languages they will be at the current time.      
Our growing team is based in the United Kingdom and the United States and we spread as far as India and the Far East.  Our project creator has been involved in a wide range of entertainment software development, including some of the world's biggest franchises. Every member of the team brings with them a wealth of experience and creativity as well as a shared passion & belief in Outsmarted.  
Our ambition is simple... To shake up our tired genre and breath new life and excitement into our sector with a roadmap for continuous growth in the userbase, features & content of Outsmarted.  
The past two years we have put our lives on hold and risked everything to get here. Outsmarted was too good a concept to ignore... 
The response of everyone that has helped us during play-testing has been a reward in of itself.  We've seen by their reactions that our game evokes a level of emotion, excitement and involvement that just isn’t possible with traditional board games, Outsmarted is genuinely the gateway to the future of board games... 
Never before has there been a board game with the capacity to grow and expand with new features and content in the way that Outsmarted can.

Even the older generation (our parents) enjoy taking part and the younger players are thrilled that there is now a board game where they can take on the adults on a level playing field...  They don't even realise how much they are learning as they play!
So we really hope you will get on board and join us at Outsmarted!  We want your support within our growing community as well as your suggestions to help us make Outsmarted the best it can be.  
We are certain that Outsmarted is just about the best board game experience you will ever get for £25 / $30, put simply, as a value proposition it's in a different league to its traditional counterparts! 
Thanks in advance for backing us and take care of yourselves.
The Outsmarted Team
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
All of the game mechanics rely on the Outsmarted software and this software development is already complete and has undergone extensive play testing over the past few months. 

We are still working on small tweaks to playability to make the game even better, but, the beauty of software is that we can continuously upgrade & finetune the game experience long after your purchase. 

Our game does not include extensive physical parts like some other more traditional board games and we are working with a highly reputable manufacturer so manufacturing issues are unlikely. 

Our team has a lot of experience in delivering top level entertainment software and has been involved in some very large projects in the past. 

The only perceivable risk is that due to the current global situation a yet unforeseen issue with manufacturing or shipping means that the delivery date is a little later than anticipated. 

In this unlikely event, we are happy to guarantee to issue a full refund to any backer that does not wish to wait for a new alternative shipping date.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Our game is software based, constantly updated with new features and content, it can also adapt to a player's preferences. In other words - it is always relevant.

This greatly increases the product lifecycle and the long term replay-ability aspect - you will be playing Outsmarted for many years to come.
Sustainable materials
We have tried to minimise the use of plastic in our design. Aside from the figures and dice, no other plastic is used. It is not yet possible to produce the quality painted miniature figures included with our game in any other material than plastic, as soon as it is, we will switch. Our target is zero plastic!
Something else
In exactly the same way that a Kindle provides access to many books, Outsmarted provides access to limitless Question Packs and saves a lot of trees. 

Over years of play our game could conceivably provide the equivalent content of dozens or more traditional games. 

This is a significant environmental saving in all respects, less manufacturing, fewer chemicals, less transport, less plastic & ultimately, huge savings in the volume of paper / card required.

updates.update_content:
Greetings backers!

Firstly, we know it's been some time since our last official Kickstarter update and want to thank you all for being patient. For those of you who have played Outsmarted over the past few months, we hope you like the improvements we've made to the software and questions, and our commitment to continual improvement of the product you backed. We aim to continue to provide more value over time.

updates.update_userinfo: The latest app update is available & other news
updates.update_content:
Hi Everyone, 
We hope you are all well and apologies for this long delayed update. 

VERSION 1.1 of the Outsmarted App 
Version 1.1 of the Outsmarted app is now available for download. If you're installing the Windows version please make sure to uninstall the previous version of the app first.

Hi Everyone,
Just a quick update on our progress. 
USA & CANADA BACKERS
Despite our best efforts, Outsmarted will now be dispatched on Monday 28th. Our stock is finally in our possession, having spent 11 days on a boat, at the port of Long Beach, after having paid an exceptional amount for an express shipping service for our games to arrive on December 12th.

Hi Everyone, 
Great news! Our Apple app got approved today and is already available on the Apple store!!

We’ll provide a link to it from this page: https://www.outsmarted.app/downloads very soon, but for now you can find it in the App Store - just search for Outsmarted.

Hi Everyone,
Apologies for issuing another update so soon after the previous one. 

If you are in the UK and you ordered more than one copy of Outsmarted then please rest assured that your order will be dispatched by our fulfilment company today and your tracking information will follow later today.

Hi,
Just a quick update as we are seeming to come under some unfair criticism on our Kickstarter comments boards regarding delivery to our UK backers. 

We have successfully dispatched 2964 of the 3100 games ordered by UK backers with tracking numbers.

Good morning everyone,
This is a quick update about our progress. 

REALLY IMPORTANT - HOW TO CONTACT US
The most important thing is how to contact us. We have already mentioned that if you would like to speak to us you must please go to and use the contact us form.

Good evening.

By now some of our UK backers have already received Outsmarted which is great news! We are sure very soon everyone will get their order too. If any UK backers have not received tracking information for their delivery by Monday then please get in touch and we will track down your game.

Hello everyone,
Just a quick message to say we began shipping yesterday in the UK. A few of you will already have received your tracking IDs and the rest will follow shortly! 

US & Canada backers will follow in just 5-7 days time, shipping from California. All other international orders started shipping yesterday, too!

Hello Everyone,

Just a quick update to let you all know that Outsmarted is now making it's way to every corner of the globe to be delivered to all of our backers. 

Our aim is to get it to everyone in time for Christmas. It was already a monumental task in such a short time frame (2 months from the end of our Kickstarter campaign to delivery), but covid is making it incredibly difficult for even the world's largest brands to move their goods around the world in a timely fashion. Even software development is made much more difficult by the remote working conditions we have faced.

campaign.story:
'Tricolour' Set!
'Mono' Set!
Say hello to SIFTR. The micro silicone colander, that makes cooking fast, clean and efficient. 
Designed to fit and work with any size of can (see below for can sizing), SIFTR lets you drain, strain and contain food without needing to make a mess or waste as much water as a conventional colander. Beyond this, we've discovered so many extra uses for it - check them out below!
Conventional colanders and sieves are massive. They're best for draining potatoes and pasta, not for getting liquid out of cans. They lead to a lot more wasted water, when all you need is SIFTR on the can, and a good shake to flush out any residue inside with a small amount of tap water. 
Fed up of colanders taking up too much space on the draining board (or dishwasher), SIFTR was created to solve the problem, and we have discovered it can do so, so much more...
Compact and colourful, SIFTR is made from silicone. This was chosen because its a flexible, food-grade, high temperature material. Each of the water-droplet shaped holes has been sized to allow the maximum flow of water both into and out of a can, without letting any of the food escape from inside. 
This is where SIFTR began. Sick of using a full size colander to drain chickpeas, kidney beans and tinned fruit, the mission was to develop a miniature version to specifically fit to cans that fully removed all residue inside, leaving only clean food behind. 
A standard can (like the ones shown in this campaign) are officially 73mm in diameter. SIFTR has a bit of stretch so can fit things slightly wider too!
Since being asked if SIFTR fits to different sized cans, we've been doing some testing and can confirm that it fits to more than the 'standard' 73mm can. 
For cans smaller than 73mm, SIFTR can be sat on top. For cans larger than 73mm, SIFTR can either be stretched or (for 20oz cans) fit inside the brim. Easy!
What impressed our early testers most about SIFTR is the massive range of extra uses they uncovered - and there are likely many more yet to be discovered! (the cocktail shaker is favourite!)
So far one of the best-rated extra uses is using SIFTR as a citrus-fruit juicer - just place half a lemon or lime inside and crush with your hand to catch the pips but release all that juice! (or hold above and catch the pips like shown in the example below!)
No one likes blocked drains, or leaving a greasy mess behind when you place a utensil on the side. SIFTR has been used to solve both of these problems!
You can even use SIFTR to open lids on tough jars, as a basket to poach eggs (the egg white can't escape from the holes once it starts cooking!) or as a herb-infuser to place inside a pan of boiling water (silicone can handle really, really high temperatures!) 
Easy to clean (handwash or dishwasher), SIFTR's compact size makes it perfect for every kitchen - big or small. Too often utensil drawers are crammed and extracting a colander can send pots and pans crashing to the floor - not a problem with SIFTR!
SIFTR is available from launch in five colour options. (The light grey features in both Trio bundles)
- Coral Pink, Apple Green, Light Grey - The Tricolour Set
- Dark Grey, Medium Grey, Light Grey - The Mono Set
Given their small size, bold colours and wide range of uses - you can just order a single unit, but really, SIFTR works best as a trio-pack. 
It has become common on Kickstarter to add in extra goals, beyond the original target. We want SIFTR to be useful for everyone, in every kitchen - so our stretch goals are going to come from you.
Stretch Goal #1 - £30,000. Different Sized Holes
Thanks to the comments and messages from backers during the first week of the campaign, the first stretch-goal will be unlocked at £30k. It will be for the same sizes/colours of SIFTR, but with 3 different sizes of hole for straining/draining smaller things. 
Stretch Goal Update #1 - Proposed hole size render. (Holes in the centre will also be shrunk!)
The idea for SIFTR started in early 2020. With everything that has happening in the new COVID-world, we found ourselves using the preproduction samples on a daily basis, long before any content was shot. We've all been cooking at home far more than usual, and these sort of kitchen-hack products have really proven their value. 
SIFTR easily pops onto all standard-sized cans to give a nice secure seal, meaning you can shake the contents to get rid of all residue inside without it flying off. 
At our end, everything is ready to go! The preproduction units you see in the campaign are all from our actual manufacturing partners. We're going to get the tooling underway ASAP and try to get a head start, we just need the support of backers like you to make this project a reality!!
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and over $500M raised in total.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
In the new Covid-world there are some fluctuations in shipping times and prices, the only risk we have here is the estimated arrival date may be delayed if global shipping routes change. However, at the time of writing the international shipping prices (and times!) are closer to the pre-covid levels, so this is why we feel the time is right to launch now.

For manufacturing, all of the units you see in the campaign are actual silicone made from prototype moulds with our actual manufacturing partner. They've been absolutely fantastic so far and are keen to get started. We are as ready to launch as possible and excited to get these out to backers all round the world!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
We're confident SIFTR will never need replacing. The silicone is safe to be used in the high temperatures found in the kitchen, and can be easily cleaned either by hand or in the dishwasher!

updates.update_userinfo: SIFTR on Amazon Prime + New Campaign Incoming
updates.update_content:
Hello hello! 

We hope everyone is doing well and enjoying your SIFTRing! There still seems to be a few that haven't received it yet (or we haven't got your address) but we'll continue to ship once addresses are confirmed!

In the mean time, lots of you have messaged us asking to share when they go live for sale elsewhere so you can order extra units or share with friends/family. We're pleased to say that at long last -
For US customers:

Hi All! 

Just a quick one to say that work on the main production tools is well underway! We decided to wait a few days extra to gather as much data as possible from the surveys before proceeding with the tooling production at the factory.

Hello hello!

First off, a massive thank you to everyone for your patience! The address surveys have taken far longer to get setup than we had forecast, and the BackerKit review process took a while too - but we are all signed off and ready for you to get your surveys!

An ENORMOUS thank you to all 4,180 of you!
Little did we know that 31 days ago when we hit launch that SIFTR was going to be so well received. Thank you all for your comments, suggestions, requests and questions over the last month!

campaign.story:
We were craving a perfectly frozen coffee from our favorite cafe, but had zero desire to step out in the humid summer heat to go get it. After a few [failed] attempts with a blender, instant coffee and a bunch of ice, we had the idea for ICEY.
Making an icy drink with your blender at home is never quite the same as the refreshing frozen drinks you get at a restaurant. We wanted to recreate the smooth texture and the satisfying feeling of that first sip. And now that we have, we’re excited to share ICEY with you all.

updates.update_content:
Well, it took some time because we wanted to be accurate. We confirmed the latest samples that came to us after a long run of production and everything works smoothly. We currently manufacture and at the same time assemble all the products.

In our estimation, within two weeks from today the products will start shipping to backers.

Dear ICEY backers,
We wanted to update, that unfortunately things are a bit stagnant at the moment due to a failure in one of the mass production molds.

After sending dozens of units to friends and family for logistical checks and seeing that everything had indeed arrived and working, we entered mass production earlier this month. Unfortunately one of the plastic molds failed in the production loads, causing a distortion that we thought we could overcome quickly and only today we got an update that the process is not so fast.

We wanted to update that although we did everything so that all the shipments went out this month to all our dear supporters, unfortunately only some will be able to go out towards the end of the month when all the other shipments, will came out gradually during June.

It's closer than ever and we are glad that despite all the difficulties we managed to get to the point we reached.

Dear ICEY backers,
It’s been a few weeks since our last update, but we haven’t forgotten about you! We We have finished printing the packaging (see below) and they are currently waiting for the completion of the production of your ICEY. Right now everything is working according to our schedules so we keep galloping forward.
Please expect your credit card to be charged between 1-3 business days through Backerkit.

Dear ICEY backers,
As promised, see further update on production progress. Most of the plastic parts have already arrived for inspection and have been approved for mass production.
We more than believe that all ICEY devices will be delivered on time as promised.

Dear ICEY backers,
The survey is closed, please contact us (info@theicey.com) within 48 hours in case you haven't done it yet.

We also excited to share with you the progress of production. The molds for mass production of external silicone huggers and motor shaft seals have already been produced . We received an examples and we are very pleased with the result.

Hello Dear backers,
Although 83% completed the survey, there are still 873 backers who haven’t yet completed it. We want to produce the ICEY, so we must lock the orders on February 19th - please don’t postpone it any longer.
Thank you to all those who filled out the survey and thanks in advance for the cooperation of those who haven’t yet done so.

It took some time for reasons unrelated to us, hopefully from now on everything will run faster.
Soon, you’ll receive an email from us with a special link to your BackerKit survey. It’s important to respond to your survey as quickly as you can since we need this information to fulfill your rewards.
You don’t need to create a BackerKit account to fill out your survey. When you receive the email with the survey, click the survey link to respond. Answer the questions about your reward preferences, provide shipping information, and purchase add-on items if you like. You don’t have access to this survey link yet, but it will be available soon via email!
We’re so grateful to have your support and excited to have you along for this journey. Together you’ve helped us raise $446,843. We can’t wait to ship ICEY to all of you!

campaign.story:
Let's be honest, one of the biggest perks of being a male is that we can pee while standing. It's fast and it's easy which makes for there hardly ever being a lineup in public restrooms. But, of course, there is a downside and... it is a messy one. 
 Inevitably we all experience a simple law of urination physics:  when we pee, our height + flow speed + porcelain + water =pee splashing-fireworks. 
This results in residual pee in and around our toilets, pee drips, pee spray, and toilet crud build-up.
As part of our mission of designing products that help alleviate the small, yet common stresses we encounter in the day to day, we've designed the Piss Pad. 
The Piss Pad is a highly dense, diffusing target that attaches to the back of your toilet bowl to diffuse urine splashback. Its robust and functional design is the first in-home urine splashback tool of its kind. 
At a total thickness of 15mm and a diameter of 40mm, the PissPad is a non-intrusive design that remains in your toilet providing minimalistic splashback protection.
 Installing and removing the PissPad is simple: simply peel, place, and stick. Because we've used microsuction waterproof adhesion, you can rest assured that your PissPad will stay anchored to the porcelain of your toilet.
Want to remove it? Simply peel it right back off. No residue will be left behind. Easy pee-sy... and you can always reinstall! 
 When put to the test, we observed that we needed to clean our toilets 67% less when compared to not using the PissPad! Hello to saving time, money, and toilet paper. Guys... you know what we're talking about: the infamous pee wipe down will be a thing of the past.
 Really, there is nothing like the Piss Pad in the market. From its size, design, and its simple anti-splash functionality, we do really mean that it's the first of its kind for in-home use.
No actual urine was used for the making of this campaign. We just thought we should say that...
Because of the dense polyurethane fibers incorporated in our design, the PissPad creates thousands of inner channels that restrict liquid from bouncing off the surface and channels urine away without any splash or spray. Aim for the Piss Pad and the work is done.
Flushing has never felt more satisfying. Once you're done aiming, simply flush as usual and the Piss Pad is rinsed after each and every use. Oh and because Piss Pads fibers are fully sealed, no smells or liquid can cling to its surface. 
 Just last year many supporters here on Kickstarter brought PURP (our previous campaign) to life. The feedback after having shipped on time to all of our supporters was phenomenal and we plan to do exactly the same this campaign if not even better.
We're New Normal, a little San Francisco-founded company focused on creating products aimed to alleviate the small, yet common, stresses we all encounter day to day.
We welcome you to join us on our journey as we create products that aim to do just that, and ideally, lay way to becoming the new normal.
Thank you for taking the time to check out our campaign. If you have any questions, please make sure to check out our  FAQ's or reach out to us by sending a message; we'd be more than happy to help!
First time on Kickstarter, and never backed a project? Feel free to chat with our chatbot below. His name is Sebastian :) 
 Get in Touch
Know a friend who would love our project? Tell them and help us spread the word. We've made it easy - simply click on the social media icon of your preference below to do so :) 
Share on FaceBook
Share on Twitter
campaign.risks:

We’re extremely passionate about the Piss Pad and committed to doing everything to solve any challenges that may arise along the way – that’s a promise!

We have our manufacture partners and operations all ready to go, and we've made sure to leave enough time so your Piss Pad arrives as planned.

THIS ISN'T OUR FIRST RODEO. 

Just last year many supporters here on Kickstarter brought PURP (our previous campaign) to life. The feedback after having shipped ON TIME to all of our supporters was phenomenal and we plan to do exactly the same this campaign, if not even better. 


We're confident that our plan will work effectively once we're funded (we've worked hard on this!), and that we'll be putting your Piss Pad in your toilets no later than the end of November- Just in time for the holidays!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Because of the dense polyurethane fibers incorporated in our design and our microsuction waterproof adhesion, you can rest assured your Piss Pad will stay anchored to the porcelain of your toilet. If you ever want to remove, simply peel it right back off. No residue left behind... Yeah, it's that easy... AND you can always reinstall. Just be sure to keep the microsuction waterproof adhesion away from dust and heat :)

campaign.story:
While making bread in Seattle... we got frustrated with the butter dishes we had. Knives falling off the tray, lids making butter rings on the counter, bulky lids that slid around while carrying, difficulty scooping up butter.  And we didn't see many stylish designs. So we decided to do something about it. Introducing...
SMARTER BUTTER DISH DESIGN
 MAGNETIC LID - A magnet on the lid keeps the included butter knife with your dish. It also serves as a place to rest a butter-covered knife during use. No more searching for a knife.
 EXTENDED FEET - With most butter dishes, you remove the lid, put it down, and have a messy ring of butter on the table. We designed extended feet to hold the lid off the table so the table stays clean.
 RAMPS - Ramps on the sides of the dish allow you to scoop up butter easier. They also serve as scraping edges to scrape the knife clean. No more pushing butter onto your knife.
 EVERYTHING SECURE - The lid feet lock the lid into the tray and the knife is magnetically held by the magnet. So everything stays together and can be carried with one hand. No more dishes and knives sliding and falling on the floor.
Magnetic lid to hold your knife
A magnet built into the lid provides an easy place to rest your knife during use, even with butter on it. Other dishes leave you wondering where to put your knife so you don't get butter on the counter.
No more butter mess on the table
We designed extended feet under the lid so that any butter mess on the sides of the lid is kept off the table. Most butter dishes have flat lids that leave a ring of butter on the table or you have to flip the lid over before you put it down.
Easily scoop up butter
We designed ramps at both ends of the butter dish so you can easily scoop up butter. Just slide your knife up the ramp. Use it to scoop up cold butter or a soft mess of butter. Then use the top of the ramp to scrape the knife clean.
Carry lid and knife with one hand
Butter Hub is your "hub" for butter. Everything is together and carried easily with one hand. Other dishes are bulky and require two hands to pickup and then you have to go looking for a knife, usually having to take another trip to the kitchen to get your mug or bread.
Easily scrape knife clean
We designed raised scraping edges to help scrape knife clean or transfer butter from one side of the knife to the other.  Other butter dishes are too low and have no edge, making it hard to scrape off butter.
A lid and knife that doesn't slide off the tray
The lid has feet that lock into the tray so that it doesn't slide when carried. And the knife too is magnetically held in place. No more flying knives and sliding ceramic lids.
Four colors - Black, Grey, White, Clear
Butter Knife Included
Our included stainless steel butter knife is shaped with a bend to help scoop up butter at a higher angle of use. It works perfectly with our magnetic lid. But you may use your own steel knife. It's best for magnetic contact if it is more flat and not round.
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and over $500M raised in total.
Limited Colors
Due to the unexpected popularity of this project, we are fairly certain that not all colors will be available to all backers as expected.  Some backers will have to wait an extra couple of months if they want to be certain of a color they want.  For example, it seems that white is much more popular than other colors and we would run out. If we run out of one color, we will give backers the choice of choosing another available color or waiting approximately 2 months to get the color they want.  The first backers to answer their surveys after the campaign will be the first to secure the color they want. We have already begun production of a second batch of BUTTER HUB dishes to cover all colors selections, eventually.  Please bear with us as we deal with these logistical issues to treat each backer equally.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have experience with three super successful Kickstarter campaigns for Zubits magnetic lacing solution. With this product we've already gone ahead with design, prototyping, and manufacturing. We're literally just waiting to receive the BUTTERHUB dishes. They should be ready to ship before the campaign ends. We've shipped previous products to more than 30,000 backers and don't expect any problems in fulfilling your orders. Our Kickstarter reviews have been super positive. The only possible risks at this point are unforeseen issues with international shipping and customs that could cause a delay.

COLOR SELECTION - Due to the unexpected popularity of this project, we are fairly certain that not all colors will be available to all backers as expected. Some backers will have to wait an extra couple of months if they want to be certain of a color they want. For example, it seems that white is much more popular than other colors and we would run out. If we run out of one color, we will give backers the choice of choosing another available color or waiting approximately 2 months to get the color they want. The first backers to answer their surveys after the campaign will be the first to secure the color they want. campaign.story:
We have engineered a durable, convenient option for rotisserie chicken. Taking up minimal space, ROTO-Q 360 self-rotating, automating the entire rotisserie process so that all you need to do is set it up, turn it on, and let it do its job. ROTO-Q 360 does not need any power, gas, or fuel to run, so you never need to worry about keeping any tanks filled or charged either. This is the ultimate in rotisserie convenience – putting healthy deliciousness always within your reach. You can enjoy rotisserie all day long if you want to, and if you are thinking about trying out a new, healthy diet, it may just be the right way to do so!
Rotisserie Cuisine Anytime You Want It   
With today's busy lifestyles, people are always looking for ways to cook healthy and delicious meals as efficiently and conveniently as possible. Well, look no further- The ROTO-Q 360 is the solution you’ve been looking for.
Fits into Your OVEN - "Everyone owns an oven!" 
Breathe new life into your cooking appliances and start producing 5-star quality, rotisserie-style fare in your very own home with the ROTO-Q 360. 
The ROTO-Q 360 has been engineered to fit into any home. If you own an oven – and everyone owns an oven – you can put ROTO-Q 360 into your kitchen. This is a portable device that you can set up as you need it, even carting it off somewhere else for the night.                      
The ROTO-Q 360 is a Money-saving Appliance
The ROTO-Q 360 has achieved perfection in cooking the rotisserie cousins while cutting down cooking time by as much as 30%. Since the ROTO-Q 360 brings down the cooking time, energy expenditure is also less which in turn saves your money. Plus, as the ROTO-Q 360 can do all the work, you don’t have to pay for other machines that may make your beautiful kitchen counter look crowded. Thus, you save money again. 
Traditional methods of rotisserie cooking require industrial-style appliances with electric driven motors. These devices are much more expensive (ranging from $250-$600) also not portable and take up a large amount of space in your kitchen not to mention the loud noise created from the fan and motors making cooking experience unpleasant.
Furthermore, cooking chicken in a crockpot or tray by roasting or baking takes a long time to prep 5-6 hours, and sometimes leaves it uncooked or soggy from the bottom side. ROTO-Q 360 will never cause this problem because it cooks the food from all sides through its 360 degrees rotating mechanism. So there is no need for adjusting, stirring or flipping in the middle of cooking, and no more rubbing more butter or oil.  A rotisserie chicken is likely to be moisture than one that has simply been roasted in the oven.
KEY FEATURES 
Non-electric design
Healthier Choice
Easy to Clean
Easy to Store 
Indoor / Outdoor
Durable 
Non-Electric Design 
Patent-Designed Gear Box
Utilizing a gearbox that stores kinetic energy when the knob of the device is turned, the ROTO-Q 360 does not require any additional electricity or fuel to operate. The cooking time can be set by manually turning the knob a specified number of rotations, to achieve the optimal cooking time for a wide array of food items. 
Healthier Choice - 90% less fat 
As the food turns, unwanted fats and grease drip down into the drip tray for healthier results, now you can make golden-brown tender-crisp chicken wings and french fries. meanwhile keeping the finger-licking taste and texture of deep-fried cooking with less fat than traditional methods.
Easy to Clean - Dishwasher Safe 
Completely non-electric, ROTO-Q 360 could not be any easier to clean. The components pull apart for simple rinsing, cutting down drastically on the clean-up time after every meal. Much easier to clean than a traditional rotisserie machine. 
Easy Store - Space Saver   
ROTO-Q 360 is also easy to store – even if your storage space is exceptionally limited. The ROTO-Q 360 is a portable device that you can set up as needed, even for chefs on the go.  It folds down into a size that will fit into any kitchen drawer as well, and it will not take up counter space, unlike other bulky food machines. 
Durable & Versatile
ROTO-Q 360 is made with durable materials so that you can count on it for the long term.
The ROTO-Q 360 can be used for more than just chicken, It is also suitable for preparing fish, poultry, meat, vegetables, potatoes, fries, and much more. Using our optional attachments, you can theoretically cook an entire meal for yourself on one rotisserie machine.
Indoor / Outdoor - Enjoy rotisserie on to go 
Simply place ROTO-Q 360 on indoor/outdoor grill or fire pit as a heating source and let the magic of the ROTO-Q 360 rotisserie do the rest. While your food is being cooked, the ROTO-Q 360 will continuously rotate to ensure that your food is evenly cooked throughout. The result is tender, juicy, restaurant-quality, rotisserie-style cuisine.  
ROTO-Q 360 self-rotates, automating the entire rotisserie process so that all you need to do is set it up, turn it on, and let it do its job. ROTO-Q 360 does not need any power, gas, or fuel to run making it the ultimate in rotisserie convenience – putting healthy delicious cuisine always within your reach.   
The entire unit weighs in just 5.5 lbs (2.5 kg), the super-portable size ROTO-Q 360 could easily fit in any backpack making it a perfect companion for hikers, campers, outdoor enthusiasts to carry around.  The compact design of the ROTO-Q 360, makes it convenient to transport the device and attach it to Gas/Charcoal grills, fire pits, etc. for use while traveling, camping, or tailgating. BBQ’s no longer have to consist of just hamburgers and hot dogs, now you can add rotisserie-style chicken, beef, ribs and more to your family gatherings and game day menus.    
The ROTO-Q 360 can cook various types of meat, fish and poultry (up to 5 lbs.) in 60 mins. or less. Additionally, by utilizing one of the many accessory attachments available for the device, you can further utilize your ROTO-Q 360 to cook other non-meat food items, such as potatoes, fries, and roasted vegetables (accessory attachments sold separately). 
Roto-Q 360 Setup  
PLAY

Rotisserie in action: speed up 8x 
PLAY

Invented by Susie Wen, the ROTO-Q 360 is the product of years of ingenuity and innovation. Wen, the creative and innovative mastermind behind popular household appliances like the Jack LaLanne’s Power Juicer, Montel Williams Health Master Elite, and Power Cooker, has helped design, develop, and manufacture machines and appliances in tens of millions units to consumers around the globe.              
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.    
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

campaign.story:
Sheet pan cooking is the easiest and most efficient way of making a delicious homemade meal.
There are lots of ways to cook on a sheet pan, but they are often wasteful or messy and not everything takes the same amount of time to cook.
We knew there had to be a better way...
Introducing Cheat Sheets, a completely new approach to sheet pan cooking.  Oven-safe, non-stick silicone dividers that will streamline your cooking and divide your ingredients, to make one-pan meals and meal prepping a breeze.
Everyone loves sheet pan cooking, but it’s not always as simple as putting everything in the oven together and coming back to find it has all cooked evenly. Reality is, not everything takes the same amount of time to cook. With Cheat Sheets, you can easily remove ingredients when they're ready and never overcook them again.
We get it... If you're new to oven cooking, it can feel like a bit of a science experiment that involves a lot of guesswork. That's why we've tested the most popular everyday ingredients and created an easy timing guide so that you’ll get perfect results every time.
Cheat Sheets are made for meal prep. With our modular dividers, you can cook all of your ingredients with even better organization and control. 
You can fit up to 6x small portions or 3x large portions on a single sheet pan and with multiple sets, you'll have everything you need to prep for the family or a week's worth of meals.
With Cheat Sheets you can easily separate ingredients and flavors without having them mingle. Whether you want to use different marinades, cook savory and sweet dishes at the same time, or simply don’t want your food to touch, Cheat Sheets has you covered.
Separation also comes in handy for families with different preferences, allowing you to create different portions for those with special dietary requirements or specific tastes - because not everybody likes pineapple on their pizza.
Aluminum foil and parchment paper are hugely wasteful and non-recyclable. Sheet pans are also notoriously difficult to clean, collecting stains and grime with every meal.
With Cheat Sheets you'll never have to scrub another sheet pan again and you'll save tonnes of wasted paper and foil. Cheat Sheets are naturally non-stick so clean-up is a breeze. They're also dishwasher safe!

The Cheat Sheets dividers are made with a premium, food-grade silicone material resistant to temperatures up to 450 degrees F. The dividers will fit on a standard half sheet pan or perfectly on the Prepd Sheet Pan included with each set.
The Prepd Sheet Pan is made from Aluminized Steel and coated with a non-stick PTFE and PFOA free coating.

Around 18 months ago we had an insight...
Out of all the Prepd Pack owners (now over 100,000 people), those who consistently meal prep all use sheet pans. But sheet pans have never changed since their inception. They are hard to clean, require you to constantly waste parchment paper and aluminum foil and are not designed to best serve how we actually cook, ie, multiple items in the oven at once.
We knew there had to be a better way. A solution that is easier to clean and gives ultimate versatility to the sheet pan. Allowing you to easily time each ingredient of the meal. A zero-waste solution removing the need to constantly create non-recyclable waste.
We were immediately drawn to silicone as it is completely food safe to high temperatures, naturally non-stick, long-lasting and resistant to bacteria. In our first phase of development, we tried dozens of different types of silicone and different colors to ensure our solution would be stain-resistant and have perfect heat transfer. Then we started our testing and prototyping phase. 
This is where we started cooking meals in the Cheat Sheets to ensure every dimension was perfect and more importantly, food cooked just as well as on a 'naked' sheet-pan.
We then opened our first tooling, received FDA approval and did a wider beta test. The feedback was phenomenal all round.After hitting our Kickstarter funding goal we have kicked off all of our final tooling so that production can begin shortly after the campaign end.
"Cooking just might be the single most important thing you can do for your dietary health . . . "Cooking just might be the single most important thing you can do for your dietary health . . . Cooking for yourself is the only sure way to take back control of your diet from the food scientists and food processors” Michael Pollan - Food Rules.
At Prepd we strongly believe that cooking for yourself or your family is the best and easiest way to stay healthy, especially during these challenging times. It doesn’t have to always be health food, so long as you cooked it and know the ingredients, that's enough.
Since we started Prepd in 2015 it has been our sole focus to help make preparing meals at home easier and more enjoyable. By creating tools and systems to help make healthy living easier, we hope to make healthy resolutions - lifelong habits.
Prepd was founded by two industrial designers, Chris Place & Will Matters. Together, we have designed and manufactured dozens of products and delivered product to customers all over the world. Our first product together was the Prepd Pack a reinvention of the lunchbox that was launched and successfully delivered to over 12,500 backers on Kickstarter in 2016.
Since launch, we've grown to a community of more than 100,000 avid meal preppers and talented cooks.
We can't wait to go on this next Prepd journey with you!
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.
This project is promoted by Green Inbox.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks and challenges

Over the last 4 years we have delivered over 100,000 products to customers all over the world. Over the journey, we have continued to improve how we work and the products we make.

We are now a globally remote team in Asia, Oceania, Europe, and America. We work around the clock and have honed the art of working separately, but together. 

Production

We have already completed an extensive pilot run, done in-kitchen tests and completed the silicone tooling. As soon as we are funded we will kick off tooling for the metal tray. The design has already been refined and approved by our engineers and is ready to go. 

We have mapped out the critical path and have made all necessary precautions to ensure we can scale production if we significantly surpass our goals.

We are very confident in our timeline, but it's our core belief to never settle for a mediocre product, so we won't be compromising on quality in order to save time. Should any issues arise we promise to keep you updated every step of the way and deliver you the best quality product as soon as possible.

Supply Chain

We have built a very capable team that works hard to ensure smooth delivery of all our products. However, processing delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

Covid-19

The health and safety of our team and partners is always our top priority. We follow all government-mandated guidelines and always err on the side of caution when it comes to the physical and mental health of our team and partners.

Our manufacturing partner for this product is operating at 100% so we are incredibly confident in our manufacturing timeline.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Cheat sheets are durable and designed to last for decades of daily use.
Reusability and recyclability
Naked sheet pans require aluminum foil or parchment paper, both are non-recyclable once used. In contrast Cheat sheets are zero waste.
Sustainable materials
Unlike plastics that are made from oil, silicone comes from silica which is derived from sand, the second most abundant material on earth. We have paid particular attention to ensure that we have used as little silicone material as possible to eliminate unnecessary waste.
Environmentally friendly factories
All of our factories follow strict environmental and social guidelines and are regularly inspected.
